title: Login Screen change
body:
Hi comunity, i would like to know if you can change the login screen, i realy don't like the omega squad login screen and i would like to know if i can change it to the kayn login screen or even older, like the kindred login screen


-Sorry for my bad english
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

-HimSnow

replies.body: Sometimes if a patch cycle includes multiple login splash screens you can choose to switch between them, but the current patch only has the Omega Squad splash art available.
Please, can you tell me how can i change them? i realy don't know where to are the login splash screens
The current patch cycle only has the Omega Squad splash art available. You won't be able to change that login splash art on this patch.
